mapper.select: SELECT id, app_code, dimension_code, dimension_name, sort, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark, version FROM iam_data_dimension WHERE deleted = 0 AND app_code = #{appCode} AND dimension_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dimensionCode}, '%') AND dimension_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dimensionName}, '%') ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC
